docs.title: Introduction
docs.text:
Documentation for the backend system for the tinymotion General Movements Assessment data collection app.

TinyMotion Backend is written in Python and exposes an API (built using FastAPI) and also has a command line interface for administering the backend.

The backend is currently under development and likely to change.

docs.title: CLI Reference
docs.text: This page provides documentation for the command line interface.

docs.title: tinymotion-backend
docs.text:
Command line interface to TinyMotion Backend

Usage:

tinymotion-backend [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:

  --help  Show this message and exit.

docs.title: users
docs.text:
Commands to interact with users in the backend.

Usage:

tinymotion-backend users [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:

  --help  Show this message and exit.

docs.title: create
docs.text:
Create a new user.

Usage:

tinymotion-backend users create [OPTIONS]

Options:

  -e, --email TEXT       The new user's email  [required]
  -k, --access-key TEXT  The new user's access key that they will use to login
                         [required]
  -d, --disabled TEXT    Disable the user's account on creation  [required]
  --help                 Show this message and exit.

docs.title: list
docs.text:
List existing users.

Usage:

tinymotion-backend users list [OPTIONS]

Options:

  --help  Show this message and exit.

docs.title: version
docs.text:
Print the version of the TinyMotion backend and exit.

Usage:

tinymotion-backend version [OPTIONS]

Options:

  --help  Show this message and exit.

docs.title: videos
docs.text:
Commands to interact with videos in the backend.

Usage:

tinymotion-backend videos [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:

  --help  Show this message and exit.

docs.title: delete
docs.text:
Delete the specified video and the associated record in the database.

VIDEO_ID is the id of of the video to delete.

Usage:

tinymotion-backend videos delete [OPTIONS] VIDEO_ID

Options:

  --help  Show this message and exit.

docs.title: list
docs.text:
List stored videos.

Usage:

tinymotion-backend videos list [OPTIONS]

Options:

  --help  Show this message and exit.
